name: Marriage Satisfaction Questionnaire
interpretation: High score speaks about the satisfaction of marriage. 0-16 points - totally dysfunctional family, 17-22 points - a dysfunctional family, 23-26 points - rather dysfunctional family, 27-28 points - transitional family 29-32 points - rather prosperous family, 33-38 points - prosperous family, 39-48 points - absolutely happy family.

questions.question: When people live as close as they do in family life, they inevitably lose their mutual understanding and sharpness of perception of the other person
Your marital relations bring you
Relatives and friends rate your marriage
If you could, then
answers: You would change a lot in the character of your spouse

questions.question: One of the problems of modern marriage is that everything gets boring, including sexual relations:
When you compare your family life with the family life of your friends and acquaintances, you think
answers: That you are more unhappy than others
that you are happier than others

answers: It is possible that it is the current spouse

questions.question: Are you proud to have someone like your spouse by your side?
Unfortunately, the disadvantages of your spouse often outweigh their advantages
The main obstacles to a happy married life are hidden
answers: Most likely in the character of your spouse

questions.question: Feelings with which you got married
Marriage blunts a person's creative abilities
You can say that your spouse has such advantages that compensate for his shortcomings
Unfortunately, your marriage is not going well with each other's emotional support:
It seems to you that your spouse often does stupid things, says inappropriate things, makes inappropriate jokes
Life in the family, as you think, does not depend on your will
Your family relations did not bring the order and organization that you expected to your life
Those who believe that it is in the family that a person can least expect respect are wrong
As a rule, the company of your spouse gives you pleasure
To tell you the truth, there is not and has not been a single bright moment in your married life
